      • userIdentifiedByToken

        public static TPersonBean userIdentifiedByToken(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String token)
        Return a bean with the user if the user with this username has a valid unexpired token. This is to prevent using the clear text password all the time. The token is created when using the restLogin routine for the first time.
        Parameters:
        username -
        token -

        Parameters:
        username -
        userPwd -
        nonce -
        request -
        anonymousLogin -
        Returns:
        Map with two entries: 1. "errors": ArrayList; 2. "mappingEnum": Integer with 2: bad credentials, 6: license problems, 7: forward to URL, 8: first time admin user, 18: request license, 9: standard login

      • decrypt

        public static java.lang.String decrypt(int key,

        Some simple XOR decryption algorithm
        Parameters:
        key - a the for decryption
        ciphertext - hexadecimal number of password, each character encoded in four digits
        Returns:
